extendedInfo.description: If you are Beyonce's fan, this app is right for you. Whenever you want to check Beyonce's lyrics, just open this app and choose the lyrics that you want. You don't have to access the internet to get the lyrics. We provide all Beyonce's lyrics here. In the Album tab, you can choose lyrics based on the album. In All lyrics tab, all of Beyonce's lyrics are here. You can quickly search the lyrics by using the search bar at the top of the page.Hope you guy enjoy using this app as much as I enjoy developing it. :)-------------------------------- Main Features -------------------------------- - Lyrics categorized by album - Show all lyrics - Search lyrics-------------------------------- List of albums -------------------------------- - Dangerously in Love- B'Day- I Am... Sasha Fierce- 4-------------------------------- List of lyrics -------------------------------- - (He's) My Man- '03 Bonnie & Clyde- 1+1- 632-5792- A Woman Like Me- After All Is Said And Done- All I Could Do Was Cry- Amor Gitano- At Last- Ave Maria- Baby Boy- Back Up- Be With You- Beautiful Liar- Beautiful Liar (Remix)- Beautiful Liar (Spanglish Version)- Bello Embustero[Beautiful Liar -
